DOC.brief_title: Study Microbiota , Metabolome , Environmental Toxins Relation Reproductive Health Rwandan Women
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman age 18 55 . *Current infection gonorrhoea , *Chlamydia , genital wart , *active genital herpes lesion , *active syphilis ; *urinary tract infection include pyelonephritis ( ascend urinary tract infection ) ; *receiving drug therapy may affect vaginal flora ; *had unprotected sexual intercourse ( vaginal oral ) within past 48 hour ; *have use vaginal douche , genital deodorant , genital wipe product past 48 hour ; *have take 'acidophilus ' 'bifidobacteria ' probiotic health food supplement past 48 hour ; *are menstruate time clinical visit .
